IntroText: It's lunch time!  Are you hungry?
Sweet!  It's great to see you.|It's lunch time.  Are you hungry?
Hi Miss.  (She looks at the floor.)|It's lunch time.  Are you hungry?
(Sarah sees you but run away.|She pretends to be in a hurry.)
You can try the college cafeteria|if you want but the food isn't great.
If you're really hungry you can try|the cafeteria but I don't recommend it Miss.
There's a small cafe nearby|you could try if you want.
Miss, there's a cafe nearby|you could try if you want.
Would you like to go|to the cafe with me now?
Miss, would you like to leave|for the cafe with me right now?
Sorry I cannot go eat with you.|I already have plans for lunch.
